lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: As a tangible representative of Christ in the world and out of  the unlimited riches He has given to His children, I'm striving to give opportunity to those who aren't as fortunate as me.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: Every now and then it's good to take step back from the materialistic world we live in, and offer a helping hand to others less fortunate.

lenders.name: R&R
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, and why not share what we have - we think the the loans mean the world to those in need and we are indeed happy for the difference that our small loans can make

lenders.name: Byron
lenders.whereabouts: Rio de Janeiro Rio de Janeiro
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because:
"Behold, I am making all things new" - Jesus Christ

"He who is kind to the poor lends to the LORD, and he will reward him for what he has done." Prov 19:17

lenders.name: Richard & Bethany
lenders.loan_because:
You know that saying "Give a man a fish and he will eat for a day. Teach him how to fish and he will eat for a lifetime"? Kiva operates on a similar principal. We could donate to a charity that hands out food or clothing, but isn't it better to give money to help support the growth of a person's business -- the source of her income -- so she can buy her own food and clothing? We liked that idea and felt our gift would have a bigger impact on an individual life through Kiva.

We chose to support Maria because we have traveled through Central America, know the poor conditions that many people live in there, and wanted to help a woman with a family. We hope her business is successful!
lenders.occupational_info: Richard is a police officer, and Bethany is director of communications for a foundation that strives for patient safety in hospitals.

lenders.name: Josephine
lenders.loan_because: it is such a direct way to help others do what they want in their lives

lenders.name: Michael and Martha
lenders.loan_because: We got a KIVA gift certificate from the matron of honor at our wedding!
lenders.occupational_info: Michael works at a local bank; Martha teaches writing at a community college.

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: Seems to be a good way to help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain and repair equipment in a factory enviroment.

lenders.name: Lucy
lenders.loan_because: It's an ideal way to help an individual or group directly
lenders.occupational_info: For a charity raising funds to help provide free veterinary treatment for sick & injured pets

lenders.name: Jillian
lenders.loan_because: I was lucky to be born where I was and everyone is not that lucky.  I believe that every life has equal value and those that have more should help those that do not. I am not rich by any means but I can at least do something.

lenders.name: rachelle and james
lenders.loan_because:
We are blessed to be able to follow our passion of telling stories through video and understand that there are millions of other people who simply require a hand up in regards to their business. 
"Be the change you want to see in the world!"
lenders.occupational_info: Video production/ Journalism

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: I have been truly blessed in my life on many levels. In addition to a certain amount of financial success, I've been lucky to travel to many other countries around the world. I love the fact that I can now be of service to entrepreneurs around the globe.
lenders.occupational_info: Although I'm now retired from my primary career as a Certified Public Accountant and Certified Fraud Examiner, I like to keep a little active in the business world. Today, I am an online sales representative for a holisitic pet food company.

lenders.loan_because: it's amazing what you can do when you leave the Politicians at home !

We hope that this allows us to indeed help as many people as possible and greatly appreciate the efforts of Kiva that allows us to so easily find the people most in need of a helping hand.

lenders.name: Kathy Ellen
lenders.loan_because: loaning is a good way to spend money. I think too many people are more concerned on how much money they make and not as concerned as they should be about how that money is spent. I want to make a difference in the world, so why can't my money?
lenders.occupational_info:
I go into schools and do presentations on history for 4th, 5th, and 6th graders. They get to interact a lot so it's a fun time for them.

lenders.loan_because: I'm a firm believer in giving everyone a level and equal opportunity to empower themselves so that poverty is not handed down to the next generation.

lenders.name: Tanya

lenders.name: Joseph

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I believe that together we can make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach science to 14-18 year olds at a public high school in Colorado Springs.

lenders.name: Envato
lenders.loan_because: On October 15th 2007 Collis Ta'eed, the founder of Envato, kicked off Blog Action Day as an annual event to persuade the world's blogs to discuss a single topic in hopes of inciting positive changes in the world.   In 2008, the second annual Blog Action Day, focused on poverty. We invite bloggers everywhere to blog about poverty and encouraged donations through Kiva to help eliminate global poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Envato started in 2006 with a simple idea - make awesome websites! Today we operate Marketplaces, Communities, Blogs & Educational Sites. Our sites reach hundreds of thousands of visitors everyday and are well loved around the world.

lenders.name: Elliot
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed by God with financial well-being, and I want to thank Him by sharing it.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and make software for computers and Internet web sites.

lenders.name: Elyse
lenders.loan_because: I have been very sick for a year now and I am starting to finally get well again which has made me realize how much I want to help others and give as much as I can to enrich their lives.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: This is one way to change the world. If you try, you will catch on.
lenders.occupational_info: Working in the Internets - where the time is always right to do right.

lenders.occupational_info: Working with metals to make something useful

lenders.occupation: Database Programmer / Analyst at Macalester College
lenders.loan_because: My focus is lending to women who provide sewing and tailoring services. My favorite part of being a Kiva lender is seeing all of the photos in my portfolio of women from around the world surround by their fabric and sewing machine. It's great to know I have been able to lend a helping hand.

lenders.occupational_info: We are an engineering and environmental science consulting firm with offices in the Western U.S.  Our business lines include Community Building, Environmental Engineering & Sciences, Natural Resources, Transportation, and Water Solutions.

lenders.loan_because: I can and I should.
lenders.occupational_info: Assistant librarian at a high school.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving time, love, protection and material resources
lenders.occupational_info: as a work in progress

lenders.name: Norise
lenders.loan_because: Giving people a helping hand feels good.

lenders.name: JaneandRaphael
lenders.loan_because: A friend sent us this site and we were so pleased to find a way to get involved in micro-banking. Helping people get a business going with such a small contribution is such a wonderful thing
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for many years as a potter with my studio at home and sold my wares at markets and through shops.I have retrained and now work in a University Library. Raphael is an artist finishing his studies while working for money part time plus finding time to be in the studio.  I have three grown daughters (my greatest artwork!) and a new grandson so feel very blessed with our life.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: My aunt and uncle gave me a $100 certificate for Local and I've loved this gift that keeps on giving !!

lenders.name: David
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Entrepreneur now working in the Internet Industry. Project development and Online Marketing.

lenders.name: Malissa
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it can be getting a business started

lenders.name: Matthias
lenders.occupational_info:
Ich habe verschiedene Internetportale, dabei geht es um ganz verschiedene Dinge, z.b.: 
www.viando.de ist ein experten portal, wo man Experten findet in allen Bereichen der Wirtschaft.
www.finanzxl.de ist ein Finanzportal, hier findet ihr alles was mit Finanzen,Geld, Versicherungen , PKV und Preisvergleichen zu tun hat,
www.verduften.de ist ein Urlaubsportal, hier findet ihr alles was mit Urlaub,verreisen, Hotels, flüge un Preisvergleichen zu tun hat.
www.zaster.de hier findet ihr einfach alles was mit geld und Preisvergleichen zu tun hat.
www.kontaktlinse.at hier findet ihr alles was mit Kontaktlinsen zu tun hat und wie man beim Kauf jedeMenge geld sparen kann.
www.tarifxl.de Hier gibts alles was mit Finanzen zu tun hat, vorallem aber Vergleiche von Versicherungen.
www.finanzierer.de Wenn ihr auf der Suche nach günstigen Krediten seid, seid ihr hier genau richtig!

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy seeing people do something of themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I assist people who have dementia

lenders.name: Carolin
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my luck!
lenders.occupational_info: I am organising events, moves, workflows, offices,... - almost everything which needs an expert in organisation!

lenders.name: jonmaim
lenders.loan_because: entrepreneurs will save the world.
lenders.occupational_info: virtual fishman.

lenders.name: Giles
lenders.loan_because:
En 2004 vivia en Sutiava, Leon, Nicaragua, por seis meses. Fui a Nicaragua para aumentar mi espanol y apprender algo del pueblo. Trabaje en el Centro de Salud F.P.P., y el Puesto de Salud de Poneloya.

Tengo memorias sola buenas de mi tiempo en Leon. Me disfruta tanto poder ayudar la gente de Nica que quiere amejorar sus vidas.

Viva Leon Jodido!
lenders.occupational_info: Hago mi entrenamiento como especialista en gastroenterologia en Nottingham, Inglaterra.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I believe it empowers men and women to be self-supporting. I have been so fortunate to have always had food, shelter, love and security. I hope to be able to help others by enabling them to better their lot in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I own 2 restaurants where we sell coffee, tea, sandwiches, and baked goods. We have many very hard-working men and women who work alongside us serving customers and making product.

lenders.name: Andy & Sally
lenders.loan_because: we can't wait for governments to take care of people
lenders.occupational_info: Sally works at a testing center for student doctors

lenders.name: Lou
lenders.loan_because: Because I believe in the power of living a life centered on helping others.  :)

lenders.name: salim
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with Healthy Happy Family and my faith demands that I help others in the community. The whole world is my family. That's my dear Mom in the profile photo (Age 93)

lenders.name: Laurie and Derek
lenders.loan_because: We support sustainable development across the world.

lenders.name: Markus
lenders.loan_because: i have been travelling worldwide since 2001. so i also have seen persons worldwide i just would like to support. i do trust them and i would like to give them and their families a chance for building up a nice future.
lenders.occupational_info: i do work as a flight attendant for germany's biggest airline. so my job is to be on a airplane for ensuring passengers safety and comfort. i am trained to handle emergency situations (medical emergency or evacuation for example) as well as to be there to serve drinks and food. i do love my job and to travel worldwide.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.occupation: Green Solutions North America Inc. Process Manager

lenders.name: steph
lenders.loan_because: it what is needed to be done!
lenders.occupational_info: passionate

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: It's incredible to watch someone's dream become a reality.

lenders.name: Jan and Norris
lenders.loan_because: hopefully a small gesture can make a world of difference.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Because it makes me happy.

lenders.name: Max
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Betty
lenders.occupational_info: I've been long involved in helping others by being an elementary school teacher.

lenders.name: Gordon
lenders.loan_because: I benefit from bank credit, other people deserve the same opportunity.

lenders.name: Mac
lenders.loan_because: Being to Cambodia I felt the people were very  kind and friendly. I saw great poverty there but also a great spirit. Someday there will hopefully be a balance of wealth in the world, hopefully this helps a little.
lenders.occupational_info: Computer Industry

lenders.name: Daisy
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: Translate, localize products

lenders.name: Kent
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to need a little help sometimes.
lenders.occupational_info: Self employed, computer repair and website design.

lenders.name: Chikara
lenders.loan_because:
1. I want to see the world by undestanding business at each different local places.
2. I want to take advantage of the situation that I am at places where people have strong currencies, Japanese yen and Canadian dollar.
3. I want to have concrete experiences touching small business and social enterprise at  developing countries.

lenders.name: Myles
lenders.loan_because: it's fun and I like to help others when possible.
lenders.occupational_info: My company sells equipment that helps enable people to communicate with each other using cell phones.

lenders.name: Ester
lenders.loan_because: It's the least I can do, I can miss the money and other people can use it!
lenders.occupational_info: I am investigating how our body reacts to infection with a virus and defends itself. If we know better how this normally works then we can improve medication and the development of vaccines.

lenders.name: Marchelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference. I've been helped out when I was in a rough spot and I'd like to pass it on and see people succeed. I can't offer a lot, but I hope my $25 can really help someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in college, studying to work in Finance. I have two babies, and a husband to take care of.

lenders.name: Amlan
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Miru
lenders.loan_because: I want to feel I'm connected with people all around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a health care worker.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: every little bit matters.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage to ensure delivery of the project on time & on budget.

lenders.name: Lili
lenders.loan_because: I want to live in a world that helps. I don't want to be someone who sits in a world where I have things that a lot of others don't have and just watch. Aren't we trying to save the world?

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place and WE are all here to do that.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: Our money stays here when we pass on; might as well circulate it ourselves than have it done for us.
lenders.occupational_info: Always looking for new ways to get better and help others do the same.

lenders.name: Anne-Marie
lenders.loan_because: It's a way to make a material difference in the world, and in a person's life (their family and community, too).
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the investment community and state/federal government to develop new energy technologies.

lenders.name: Shawn + Sandra
lenders.loan_because: we love our neighbour as ourselves
lenders.occupational_info:
Shawn-milk cows/grow crops
 Sandra-clean teeth of plaque and tartar and educate/lecture  on floss/brush to people

lenders.name: Cody
lenders.loan_because: I feel called to make the world a tangibly better place because of my faith in Jesus Christ.

lenders.name: Kerberos
lenders.loan_because: I belive that capitalism and freetrade is the fastest way to liberate people from poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with email,webhotels and domains to help their business thrive.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because:
People have loaned me money before.  I want to help others just as I have been helped.  I love people and I'm very passionate about helping people better their lives.
I also used to own my own business.  So I know what it's like to borrow money.
One of my favorite words is 'altruism'.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell lighting solutions to major business.  I help them reduce their energy costs and help improve the environment.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I am so fortunate
lenders.occupational_info: I strive for a high quality of life

lenders.name: Finn
lenders.loan_because: Misallocation, not scarcity, is the problem.

lenders.name: Katherine,Adam&Chris
lenders.loan_because: In BC, a few years ago, we were given a $100 tax credit for each person in our home. We had heard about micro loans and wanted to use this money that way.
lenders.occupational_info:
Katherine (mom) is a interior designer
Adam (23)is a warehouse worker for a local food distributor.
Chris is training to be a chef, going to school and working in a local restaurant.

lenders.name: Luis
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed in life and if I can help, then i want to!
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school and im also a soldier.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because:
1. G-d
2. I can.
 3. I know what it is to be in such positions, & what it is to come through such.
4. My faith.

lenders.name: Trinity
lenders.loan_because: I can! (Yay)

lenders.name: Patrick & Silvia
lenders.loan_because: It's an inspiring and rewarding way to give back, which empowers others to prosper.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies find the people they need for jobs to help the company grow and prosper.

lenders.name: sarado
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other as much as possible.

lenders.name: K, Lee, E & A
lenders.loan_because: we want to help others.

lenders.name: Peter T
lenders.loan_because: it is satisfying to help people who want to help themselves, and who can benefit so much from a relatively modest amount of money.
lenders.occupational_info: I am involved in the technical end of electronic news gathering. We send and receive news material via satellite, microwave, and computer networks.

lenders.name: Tania
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: Isn't it our duty in life to share with those who have less than us?

lenders.name: Anat
lenders.loan_because: I'd love to see women pulling through and improving opportunities for each other.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I understand the need for opportunity. This is a way I can afford to help someone make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info:
Reviewer: a paycheck
Nursing student: life's dream

lenders.name: charlie
lenders.loan_because: I want to provide people opportunities to fulfill their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy helping people through well designed software.

lenders.name: Jeanette
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Ingrid
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower people to change their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I run my own business helping charities market themselves better.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate in where I live. I love the practical help Kiva offers and there is the opportunity to help so many!

lenders.name: World Stamp Collector
lenders.occupational_info:
Do you like to collect stamps, just like I do ?
Send me a message with your adres and I send you 
stamps of the Netherlands for free !

lenders.name: Doug and Julia
lenders.loan_because: This seems such an easy way to make a lasting difference

lenders.name: Nadine
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Kunthea
lenders.loan_because: I came from a poor country as well and i know what it's like to be poor. Now that I'm in a better place I want to help those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Well, I've started a small project especially for this. I collect soda cans.

lenders.name: Paula, Patrick & Bamboo
lenders.loan_because: We believe that each life is a universe.
lenders.occupational_info:
Paula is a student who believes that each person can make an impact.

Patrick works for a consulting firm, helping companies with strategic issues.

Bamboo is their 2 years old pekingese dog.

lenders.name: Patrik
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Nonprofit Tech
lenders.loan_because: Nonprofit Tech feels it's important to give. We've decided to go beyond our support of organizations, and use Kiva to give directly to people, as well.
lenders.occupational_info: We support nonprofit and public organization by simplifying, improving, and managing their technology needs.

lenders.name: sheila
lenders.loan_because: It's not a charitable donation.  The first time it's a small business loan, but each time it's repaid it becomes a reinvestment of the same dollars, making me a successful financier.  "It's a powerful and sustainable way to empower someone right now to lift themselves out of poverty."

lenders.name: John Hall
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur. I know how hard it is to get started and I want to support the dreams of others that want to make a better life for themselves. I feel extremely blessed in my life and that is why it is my obligation to give to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist and an author.

lenders.name: Chima
lenders.loan_because: I believe financial resource is a backbone to any establishment when funded yields certain results which is favorable on the part of the owner and the society he finds himself.
lenders.occupational_info: As African we have a great and diverse talents we were born with. It is imperative that we use them to achieve the best be it in business endeavors or other areas of life meant to push us through the falling Economy in Africa.

lenders.name: Tara, Drew & Jack
lenders.loan_because: when you give what you have, you create the space for prosperity in your own life and in the lives of others.  Kiva is our way of expressing gratitude for everyone who has shared their prosperity with us.

lenders.name: Pere
lenders.loan_because: I dream

lenders.name: Jon Lindström
lenders.loan_because:
In Sweden everyone is allowed to take good loans from the government so we all can study at a University. I'm thankful that I can, with the help of loans,  full fill my dream to become a Physician. This is the reason I like to help people full fill their dreams and advance their way of life.

I lend money because I think loans stimulate growth and development much better than given money.

I focus my loans on food production and infrastructure. I believe these are the main areas which are most important to improve first in poor countries. 

The interest rate taken by the field partners is rather important for me. I believe it absurd with rates higher than 20% when we take all the risk. It's not the field partners I wish to help, it's the borrower.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I can think of no better way to share God's love than to put my resources to work for the benefit of others.
lenders.occupational_info: Pastor of Blair Lutheran Church in Blair, Wisconsin.

lenders.name: Hjördis
lenders.loan_because: It is important to trust someone and help him

lenders.name: Drew & Sarah
lenders.loan_because: Anyone who has ever succeeded at anything has done so by the help of others.

lenders.name: David and Christina
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we see the great advantage of a company like Kiva that gives people that are willing to work the opportunity to get out of poverty and make a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: We are involved with people from all over the world in their wedding day or the day that they renew their vows.  This is a very enjoyable work that is very rewarding.

lenders.name: Christel
lenders.loan_because: I've received a loan as well from a good friend when no bank was willing to help us. The trust I've got from the good friend, meant a lot to me. I gave me hope and a more peaceful mind. Plus the ability to dream again.

lenders.name: Kelly & Dave
lenders.loan_because:
I believe it is the right thing to do. If I can help someone/some people have a better life/better lives, then that is always a good thing.

I can never loan a lot, but I believe that even the smallest amount makes a big difference.

I like loaning as 100% of the money reaches the people who need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in full time education studying Archaeology and History at Cardiff University. I also work for a large gas and electric company here in the UK to help me stay in education.
